entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
